title: Jurassic World Evolution 2 (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Who doesn't like dinosaurs? Claim Jurassic World Evolution 2 for free on the Epic Games Store and build your dream Jurassic Park just like in the Jurassic World film franchise. But be careful... Dinosaurs like to run away sometimes... and eat some people.
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

instructions:
